content.raw: Another question, where best to recover dt. ImuSensor already computes it using the incoming message. This is probably best, but how to generalize it to the other sensors. Will all sensor msgs have a timestamp, and can I somehow access this timestamp in the sensor base class and set dt for all derived sensors so I don't have to repeat the code?
content.html: Another question, where best to recover dt. ImuSensor already computes it using the incoming message. This is probably best, but how to generalize it to the other sensors. Will all sensor msgs have a timestamp, and can I somehow access this timestamp in the sensor base class and set dt for all derived sensors so I don't have to repeat the code?
